00037 void
00038 ScanContext::initialize(int64_t rev, const ScanSpec *ss,
00039     const RangeSpec *range_spec, SchemaPtr &sp) {
00040   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00041   uint32_t max_versions = 0;
00042   boost::xtime xtnow;
00043   int64_t now;
00044 
00045   boost::xtime_get(&xtnow, boost::TIME_UTC);
00046   now = ((int64_t)xtnow.sec * 1000000000LL) + (int64_t)xtnow.nsec;
00047 
00048   revision = (rev == TIMESTAMP_NULL) ? TIMESTAMP_MAX : rev;
00049 
00050   // set time interval
00051   if (ss) {
00052     time_interval.first = ss->time_interval.first;
00053     time_interval.second = ss->time_interval.second;
00054   }
00055   else {
00056     time_interval.first = TIMESTAMP_MIN;
00057     time_interval.second = TIMESTAMP_MAX;
00058   }
00059 
00060   spec = ss;
00061   range = range_spec;
00062 
00063   if (spec == 0)
00064     memset(family_mask, true, 256*sizeof(bool));
00065   else {
00066     memset(family_mask, false, 256*sizeof(bool));
00067     max_versions = spec->max_versions;
00068   }
00069 
00070   memset(family_info, 0, 256*sizeof(CellFilterInfo));
00071 
00072   if (sp) {
00073     schema = sp;
00074 
00075     if (spec && spec->columns.size() > 0) {
00076       foreach(const char *cfstr, spec->columns) {
00077         cf = schema->get_column_family(cfstr);
00078 
00079         if (cf == 0)
00080           HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_COLUMNFAMILY, cfstr);
00081 
00082         family_mask[cf->id] = true;
00083         if (cf->ttl == 0)
00084           family_info[cf->id].cutoff_time = TIMESTAMP_MIN;
00085         else
00086           family_info[cf->id].cutoff_time = now
00087               - ((uint64_t)cf->ttl * 1000000000LL);
00088         if (max_versions == 0)
00089           family_info[cf->id].max_versions = cf->max_versions;
00090         else {
00091           if (cf->max_versions == 0)
00092             family_info[cf->id].max_versions = max_versions;
00093           else
00094             family_info[cf->id].max_versions = max_versions < cf->max_versions
00095                 ?  max_versions : cf->max_versions;
00096         }
00097       }
00098     }
00099     else {
00100       Schema::AccessGroups &aglist = schema->get_access_groups();
00101 
00102       family_mask[0] = true;  // ROW_DELETE records have 0 column family, so
00103                               // this allows them to pass through
00104       for (Schema::AccessGroups::iterator ag_it = aglist.begin();
00105            ag_it != aglist.end(); ++ag_it) {
00106         for (Schema::ColumnFamilies::iterator cf_it = (*ag_it)->columns.begin();
00107              cf_it != (*ag_it)->columns.end(); ++cf_it) {
00108           if ((*cf_it)->id == 0)
00109             HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_SCHEMA_INVALID_CFID,
00110                       "Bad ID for Column Family '%s'", (*cf_it)->name.c_str());
00111           if ((*cf_it)->deleted) {
00112             family_mask[(*cf_it)->id] = false;
00113             continue;
00114           }
00115           family_mask[(*cf_it)->id] = true;
00116           if ((*cf_it)->ttl == 0)
00117             family_info[(*cf_it)->id].cutoff_time = 0;
00118           else
00119             family_info[(*cf_it)->id].cutoff_time = now
00120                 - ((uint64_t)(*cf_it)->ttl * 1000000000LL);
00121 
00122           if (max_versions == 0)
00123             family_info[(*cf_it)->id].max_versions = (*cf_it)->max_versions;
00124           else {
00125             if ((*cf_it)->max_versions == 0)
00126               family_info[(*cf_it)->id].max_versions = max_versions;
00127             else
00128               family_info[(*cf_it)->id].max_versions =
00129                   (max_versions < (*cf_it)->max_versions)
00130                   ? max_versions : (*cf_it)->max_versions;
00131           }
00132         }
00133       }
00134     }
00135   }
00136 
00141   single_row = false;
00142   has_cell_interval = false;
00143   has_start_cf_qualifier = false;
00144   start_inclusive = end_inclusive = true;
00145   restricted_range = true;
00146 
00147   if (spec) {
00148     const char *ptr = 0;
00149 
00150     if (spec->row_limit == 1)
00151       single_row = true;
00152 
00153     if (!spec->row_intervals.empty()) {
00154 
00155       // start row
00156       start_row = spec->row_intervals[0].start;
00157       start_inclusive = spec->row_intervals[0].start_inclusive;
00158 
00159       // end row
00160       if (spec->row_intervals[0].end[0] == 0)
00161         end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00162       else {
00163         end_row = spec->row_intervals[0].end;
00164         end_inclusive = spec->row_intervals[0].end_inclusive;
00165 
00166         if (!strcmp(spec->row_intervals[0].start, spec->row_intervals[0].end))
00167           single_row = true;
00168       }
00169     }
00170     else if (!spec->cell_intervals.empty()) {
00171       String column_family_str;
00172       Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00173 
00174       has_cell_interval = true;
00175 
00176       if (*spec->cell_intervals[0].start_column) {
00177         ptr = strchr(spec->cell_intervals[0].start_column, ':');
00178         if (ptr == 0) {
00179           ptr = spec->cell_intervals[0].start_column
00180                 + strlen(spec->cell_intervals[0].start_column);
00181           start_qualifier = "";
00182         }
00183         else {
00184           start_qualifier = ptr+1;
00185           start_key.column_qualifier = start_qualifier.c_str();
00186           start_key.column_qualifier_len = start_qualifier.length();
00187           has_start_cf_qualifier = true;
00188         }
00189         column_family_str = String(spec->cell_intervals[0].start_column,
00190                                    ptr - spec->cell_intervals[0].start_column);
00191         if ((cf = schema->get_column_family(column_family_str)) == 0)
00192           HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC,
00193                    format("Bad column family (%s)", column_family_str.c_str()));
00194 
00195         start_key.column_family_code = cf->id;
00196 
00197         start_row = spec->cell_intervals[0].start_row;
00198         start_inclusive = spec->cell_intervals[0].start_inclusive;
00199       }
00200       else {
00201         start_row = "";
00202         start_qualifier = "";
00203         start_inclusive = true;
00204       }
00205 
00206       if (*spec->cell_intervals[0].end_column) {
00207         ptr = strchr(spec->cell_intervals[0].end_column, ':');
00208         if (ptr == 0) {
00209           ptr = spec->cell_intervals[0].end_column
00210                 + strlen(spec->cell_intervals[0].end_column);
00211           end_qualifier = "";
00212         }
00213         else {
00214           end_qualifier = ptr+1;
00215           end_key.column_qualifier = end_qualifier.c_str();
00216           end_key.column_qualifier_len = end_qualifier.length();
00217         }
00218 
00219         column_family_str = String(spec->cell_intervals[0].end_column,
00220                                    ptr - spec->cell_intervals[0].end_column);
00221         if ((cf = schema->get_column_family(column_family_str)) == 0)
00222           HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "Bad column family (%s)",
00223                     column_family_str.c_str());
00224 
00225         end_key.column_family_code = cf->id;
00226 
00227         end_row = spec->cell_intervals[0].end_row;
00228         end_inclusive = spec->cell_intervals[0].end_inclusive;
00229       }
00230       else {
00231         end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00232         end_qualifier = "";
00233       }
00234 
00235       if (!strcmp(spec->cell_intervals[0].start_row,
00236                   spec->cell_intervals[0].end_row))
00237         single_row = true;
00238 
00239       if (single_row && ((end_key.column_family_code == start_key.column_family_code
00240           && start_qualifier.compare(end_qualifier) > 0)
00241           || start_key.column_family_code > end_key.column_family_code))
00242         HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "start_cell > end_cell");
00243 
00244     }
00245     else {
00246       start_row = "";
00247       end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00248     }
00249 
00250     if (start_row.compare(end_row) > 0)
00251       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "start_row > end_row");
00252   }
00253   else {
00254     start_row = "";
00255     end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00256   }
00257 
00258   if (start_row == "" && end_row == Key::END_ROW_MARKER)
00259     restricted_range = false;
00260 
00261   assert(start_row <= end_row);
00262 
00263   start_key.row = start_row.c_str();
00264   start_key.row_len = start_row.length();
00265 
00266   end_key.row = end_row.c_str();
00267   end_key.row_len = end_row.length();
00268 
00269   dbuf.reserve(start_row.length() + start_qualifier.length()
00270                + end_row.length() + end_qualifier.length() + 64);
00271 
00272   String tmp_str;
00273 
00274   if (spec && !spec->cell_intervals.empty()) {
00275     if (start_inclusive)
00276       create_key_and_append(dbuf, FLAG_INSERT, start_key.row, start_key.column_family_code,
00277                             start_key.column_qualifier, TIMESTAMP_MAX, revision);
00278     else {
00279       if (start_key.column_qualifier == 0)
00280         tmp_str = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00281       else {
00282         tmp_str = start_key.column_qualifier;
00283         tmp_str.append(1, 1);      
00284       }
00285       create_key_and_append(dbuf, FLAG_INSERT, start_key.row,
00286                             start_key.column_family_code,
00287                             tmp_str.c_str(), TIMESTAMP_MAX, revision);
00288     }
00289     start_serkey.ptr = dbuf.base;
00290     end_serkey.ptr = dbuf.ptr;
00291 
00292     if (!end_inclusive)
00293       create_key_and_append(dbuf, 0, end_key.row, end_key.column_family_code,
00294                             end_key.column_qualifier, TIMESTAMP_MAX, revision);
00295     else {
00296       if (end_key.column_qualifier == 0)
00297         tmp_str = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00298       else {
00299         tmp_str = end_key.column_qualifier;
00300         tmp_str.append(1, 1);
00301       }
00302       create_key_and_append(dbuf, 0, end_key.row, end_key.column_family_code,
00303                             tmp_str.c_str(), TIMESTAMP_MAX, revision);
00304     }
00305   }
00306   else {
00307     if (start_inclusive || start_key.row_len == 0)
00308       create_key_and_append(dbuf, 0, start_key.row, 0, "", TIMESTAMP_MAX, revision);
00309     else {
00310       tmp_str = start_key.row;
00311       tmp_str.append(1, 1);
00312       create_key_and_append(dbuf, 0, tmp_str.c_str(), 0, "", TIMESTAMP_MAX, revision);
00313     }
00314     start_serkey.ptr = dbuf.base;
00315     end_serkey.ptr = dbuf.ptr;
00316     if (!end_inclusive)
00317       create_key_and_append(dbuf, 0, end_key.row, 0, "", TIMESTAMP_MAX, revision);
00318     else {
00319       tmp_str = end_key.row;
00320       tmp_str.append(1, 1);
00321       create_key_and_append(dbuf, 0, tmp_str.c_str(), 0, "", TIMESTAMP_MAX, revision);
00322     }
00323   }
00324 
00325 }
